info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Thomas County through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colby, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Thomas County, including the following locations... Mingo and Halford. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 51 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
